attributes.additional_details: Consider the cost incurred over a weekly, monthly annual period if you are unemployed and are expected to attend your local job centre on a daily basis, I have calculated the cost of a return bus ticket over a month and at £3.50 daily it would tally up to a staggering £70.00 monthly, if the new system is ever to be introduced I urge you to sign this petition in the hope that the government will subsidize these travel expenses as it is impossible to fund the cost on an unemployed income when you consider the cost of basic living .maintain dignity when faced with unemployment, don't tolerate bully boy tactics, don't get into debt by looking for employment that is rare in most areas of the country despite what the government would have you believe, seek work but not at personal cost
